title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama repo: a lightweight, extensible framework for running Llama 2, Code Llama, and other large language models locally with a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node and browsers; identical API surface to the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package offering Ollama LLM, embedder, and retriever components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama models; supports multi-model chats, RAG, and admin panel.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API, streaming, and Android compatibility.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot’s UI for inline suggestions.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper with conversation history, markdown rendering, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and autoscaling.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator components.

title: ollama-camunda
summary: Camunda 8 connector that invokes Ollama models inside BPMN processes for AI-powered workflows.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker Compose stacks including GPU, CPU-only, and Open-WebUI variants.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake for reproducible Ollama builds on Linux and macOS with automatic CUDA/ROCm detection.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust client for Ollama using reqwest and serde; supports chat, generate, and embeddings.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template that connects to local Ollama instances with session memory and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with any Ollama model via slash commands.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module for CI pipelines that spins up Ollama containers to run model-based unit tests.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir wrapper around Ollama’s REST API with GenServer-style process management and streaming.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a side-panel chat powered by local Ollama models for note-taking assistance.
